mainHero.title: Resint!
mainHero.subtitle: Your guide to landing your dream internship.
mainHero.description: Getting ready for the internship/job search process as a college student can be very tedious and time consuming, Resint is here to make that process as easy as possible with efficient and user-friendly tracking and organization.

items.title: Track your internships!
items.description: Resint makes tracking easy with the sihmple click of a button. Download and add the resint chrome extension to your internet browser and start tracking! With one click, resint will automatically track your internship and add it to your dashboard, saving your time and effort.

items.title: Save all your Internship resources!
items.description: Resint allows you to easily keep all your resources in the same place! If you're feeling anxious for the internship process, Resint will make it as easy as possible to land your dream internship!

features.title: Latest & greatest features
features.subtitle: All that resint has to offer!
features.description: Resint has been long in the making, as our team realized that many students have a difficult time applying for internships, we have come up with a solution to solve these issues.

items.name: Build your resume
items.description: Resint has a resume template feature that allows our users to downlaod and make it your own.

items.name: Track your internships
items.description: Resint allows you to track your internship applications and also monitor the status of your applications. As well as make the overall process of applying for an internship as easy as possible.

items.name: Save all your Internship resources
items.description: There are tons of resources out there and it can be difficult to keep track. Resint allows you to save and organize these resources wether it be articles, websites, books and more

items.name: Your own personal internship guide
items.description: Resint offers a step by step guide to make overcoming the internship struggle as easy as possible.
